displayProperties.description: Create a large barrier that can be used to reinforce a position with cover from enemy fire.
displayProperties.name: Towering Barricade

displayProperties.description: Create a small barrier that you can peek over while aiming down sights and that increases reload speed for your equipped weapon when you stand behind it.
displayProperties.name: Rally Barricade

displayProperties.description: Jump while airborne to activate Lift and launch into the air at greater heights.
displayProperties.name: High Lift

displayProperties.description: Jump while airborne to activate Lift and launch into the air with strong directional control.
displayProperties.name: Strafe Lift

displayProperties.description: Jump while airborne to activate Lift and launch into the air with a strong initial burst of momentum.
displayProperties.name: Catapult Lift

displayProperties.description: An explosive grenade that suppresses, preventing enemies from using abilities for a short time.
displayProperties.name: Suppressor Grenade

displayProperties.description: A grenade that attaches to enemies and explodes twice.
displayProperties.name: Magnetic Grenade

displayProperties.description: A grenade that creates a horizontal wall of burning Void Light.
displayProperties.name: Voidwall Grenade

displayProperties.description: Press  to summon a shield of Void Light. While Sentinel Shield is active, press  to attack. Hold  to guard. Press  to perform a Shield Throw.
displayProperties.name: Sentinel Shield

displayProperties.description: Defeat an enemy with this melee ability to create an overshield around you and nearby allies. Final blows grant melee energy when this overshield is active.
displayProperties.name: Defensive Strike

displayProperties.description: Melee kills restore Health for you and nearby allies.
displayProperties.name: Rallying Force

displayProperties.description: Your Overshield from Defensive Strike lasts longer and increases melee damage and reload speed.
displayProperties.name: Turn the Tide

displayProperties.description: When Super energy is full, create an indestructible dome to protect you and your allies. Passing through Ward of Dawn grants you and your allies a temporary increase to weapon damage.
displayProperties.name: Ward of Dawn

displayProperties.description: After sprinting for a short time, use this melee ability to unleash a devastating Shield Bash that disorients enemies and suppresses the target of Shield Bash.
displayProperties.name: Shield Bash

displayProperties.description: Grenade kills recharge your Grenade energy.
displayProperties.name: Superior Arsenal

displayProperties.description: Kills while surrounded by enemies reduce the cooldown of your Super.
displayProperties.name: In the Trenches

displayProperties.description: Gain an additional Shield Throw charge while Sentinel Shield is active.
displayProperties.name: Second Shield

displayProperties.description: Guard with Sentinel Shield to create a defensive wall. Allies who shoot through the wall have increased weapon damage, and Guarding allies makes the shield last longer.
displayProperties.name: Banner Shield

displayProperties.description: Strike an enemywith this melee ability to cause a Void explosion.
displayProperties.name: Tactical Strike

displayProperties.description: Hit a target with a Void ability to attach a Void detonator. Further hits cause the detonator to explode, dealing damage to surrounding targets.
displayProperties.name: Controlled Demolition

displayProperties.description: You and nearby allies regain health as well as grenade and melee energy when your Void detonators explode.
displayProperties.name: Resupply
